meanings.definition: A person who is influential or important in a particular field or industry.
meanings.sent1: In our small town, the local macher is the owner of the biggest store.
meanings.sent2: The tech industry macher was invited to speak at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The macher of the neighborhood barbecue was the one with the secret sauce recipe.
meanings.sent4: She became the macher of the book club, always recommending the best reads.
meanings.sent5: The macher of the fashion world was known for discovering new talents.

meanings.definition: To boast or brag about one's accomplishments or connections.
meanings.sent1: He would macher about his new car to anyone who would listen.
meanings.sent2: She machered about her promotion at work to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The little bird machered about how high it could fly, much to the amusement of the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The politician machered about his plans for the city, hoping to gain support.
meanings.sent5: The chef machered about his famous dish, claiming it was the best in town.
